author: Josh Dzieza
title: Warehouse workers are forcing Amazon to take COVID-19 seriously
description: After missed warnings, haphazard quarantines, and a fired protest organizer, Amazon is finally instituting new safety measures.
content: Early Tuesday, March 24th, Barbara Chandler drove from her home in Queens to the Staten Island Amazon warehouse where shed worked for three years. The streets were emptier than usual. New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo had ordered all nonessential businesses to close… [+21980 chars]
